abstract: Joseph C Meek Jr, friend of accused Charleston, SC, shooter Dylann S Roof, will cooperate with authorities in plea bargain agreement; is charged with lying to investigators and hiding information about June 2015 attack.
lead_paragraph: Joseph C. Meek Jr., a friend of Dylann S. Roof, reached a plea deal after being charged with concealing information about the June 17 attack.

headline.main: Friend of Charleston Church Shooting Suspect Agrees to Cooperate
headline.print_headline: Friend of Suspect in Charleston Church Shootings Agrees to Cooperate With Prosecutors

snippet: Joseph C. Meek Jr., a friend of Dylann S. Roof, reached a plea deal after being charged with concealing information about the June 17 attack.

keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
